fields.name: resource_name
fields.description: The name of the data resource being measured

fields.name: field_name
fields.description: The name of the field being measured. If null, the metric applies to the whole data resource

fields.name: measure
fields.description: calculated value from the data points in the resource_name, field_name

fields.name: value
fields.description: actual value of a data point in the resource_name, field_name

fields.name: annotation
fields.description: A statement by the publisher about the measure or value
